subject: Failure Message
msgSnippet: When I assertEquals fails, it has a phrase in it of the form expected  but was .  This message (and possibly others are being truncated with an
messageBody:
When I assertEquals fails, it has a phrase in it of the form "expected
<foo> but was <bar>". This message (and possibly others are being
truncated with an elipsis...

Is there anyway to change the point of trunction or disable it entirely?
